issue.title: quoted should use char_traits for comparison

blockquote.p: — Each character in s. If the character to be output is equal to escape or delim, as determined by operator==, first output escape.
— If the first character extracted is equal to delim, as determined by operator==, […]

discussion.p: Also, I believe that p3 implies that:
should both compile, or both fail to compile, based on whether or not their char_traits match. But I believe that the standard should say that explicitly.
